channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump’s return spurs EU to act—but will European leaders heed Draghi’s €800 billion challenge?
item.description: Confronted with the return of Donald Trump, EU leaders are set to commit to deeply reform Europe's economy.

item.title: Alex Jones supporters and opponents are both angling to buy Infowars at bankruptcy auction
item.description: They include Roger Stone, an ally of Jones and Donald Trump, and anti-Jones progressive media groups.

item.title: Donald Trump’s election win will create a DEI reckoning that forces companies to either stand up for their policies or ‘step away’
item.description: “I think this is another thing that will only get harder."

item.title: Hungary’s Viktor Orban and European Far-Right Leaders Welcome Trump’s Return
item.description: Viktor Orban of Hungary and other right-wing European politicians hail the return of a U.S. president who shares their tough views on issues like immi...

item.title: California wildfire destroys 132 buildings as raging winds spread the flames across 32 square miles

item.title: How My War Came Home
item.description: A reporter thought of his city in the west of Ukraine as a haven from Russian bombs — until a strike hit his street.

item.title: Trump’s Historic Chief of Staff Pick, and What Elon Musk Wants Now

item.title: 8 surprising, subtle signs you have high-functioning anxiety
item.description: Some people's anxiety is masked by productivity—and it doesn't need to be that way.

item.title: What Is the Best Version of a Second Trump Administration?
item.description: Opinion columnists break down what the best version of a second Trump administration could look like.
